message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you that I think you'll be interested in. I'm asking $125 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $100 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $110.  Let's meet in the middle and see if we can make this work!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $110, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
